column2: Finrod departs Doriath seeking the caves under the Taur-en-Faroth. Galadriel stays in Doriath out of friendship for Melian.

column1: * Finrod finds the caves and founds the kingdom of Nargothrond. He is named Felagund
column3: by the Dwarves of the Blue Mountains who help him build his realm.
